channel.title: zuul on Jerome Brette's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in zuul on Jerome Brette's Blog

item.title: Zuul
item.description: Goal OpenStack project are using Zuul for CI/CD process. Zuul itself is based on Ansible to perform the tasks. This post is the collection of notes and tips used during the couple of update I did to some openstack projects. Understanding Zuul WIP Usefull Links WIP
